allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: Make playwright import lazy to avoid ModuleNotFoundError on Railway

The API container doesn''t include playwright since only HTTP-based
crawlers are used. Move the import behind TYPE_CHECKING for type hints
and defer async_playwright import to runtime inside __aenter__.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Make log level configurable via LOG_LEVEL env var

Default to DEBUG for detailed Railway logs. Can be overridden
with LOG_LEVEL=INFO in production.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: Use search.php for LibraryThing search URL

/search?search= doesn''t return results, but /search.php?search= does.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
